name: Societatea Nationala Nuclearelectrica SA
goal:
Operation of the two nuclear units in safety conditions and safety for the personnel, population, environment and production units;

Maitaning of the operation capacity over the average value in the nuclear industry;

Achievement of major investment objectives;

Improvement of the financial indicators of the company.
interests: Banking and financial services, Budget, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, European Neighbourhood Policy, External Relations, Fraud prevention, General and Institutional Affairs, International co-operation and development, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives:
“Clean Energy for All Europeans” legislative package
Euratom Programme complementing the Horizon 2020 Framework Programme
“Strategy for long-term EU greenhouse gas emissions reductions”
